name: Diamond Hunter (Timuryesm)
description:
The name of the 2D game is Diamond Hunter. The player controls a Hunter, use the space to jump. The Hunter likes to diamonds, and each diamonds he finds will get a score. But on the way there will be sculls cursing him; if he touches, the scull will reduce the amount of HP. At the same time, there are also mystical creature trying to catch up and kill. However, there are some sort of fire sphere that restore the HP.
